property.name: files.per.thread
property.description: the number of files to read for each read thread

property.name: read.mode
property.description: the read mode of read test, should be RANDOM or SEQUENCE

property.name: buffer.size.bytes
property.description: the size of the buffer read once

property.name: read.type
property.description: the ReadType of the read operation, no it only used for Alluxio

property.name: read.bytes
property.description: the read bytes for each skip-and-read operator

property.name: skip.bytes
property.description: the skip bytes for each skip-and-read operator

property.name: skip.times.per.file
property.description: the skip-and-read times for each read file

property.name: skip.mode
property.description: the skip mode, should be FORWARD or RANDOM
